snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo named a pair of his onetime rivals to develop proposals for the State Legislature to consider.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo names former Gov George E Pataki and former State Comptroller H Carl McCall to commission that will develop legislative proposals to reduce New York State taxes; panel will presents its recommendations to state lawmakers before Legislature convenes in early 2014.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo named a pair of his onetime rivals to develop proposals for the State Legislature to consider.

headline.main: Cuomo Enlists Pataki and McCall to Help With Tax-Cut Plans
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Enlists 2 Former Rivals to Help Him Cut Taxes as He Runs for Another Term
